c82a2d7f8a2cab40073b04bf25de0dc8.name: Kawasaki Ki-100 Goshikisen Army Type 5 Fighter
c82a2d7f8a2cab40073b04bf25de0dc8.title: Kawasaki Ki-100

variants.name: Ki-100
variants.description: Ki-100 (prototypes): Kawasaki Ki-61 II KAI modified with a radial engine. 3 converted from Ki-61s.

variants.name: Ki-100-I-Ko
variants.description: Ki-100-I-Ko: initial production variant, modified from Ki-61 II KAI. 271 converted from Ki-61s.

variants.name: Ki-100-I-Otsu
variants.description: Ki-100-I-Otsu: improved canopy and cut down rear fuselage. 118 built.

variants.name: Ki-100-II
variants.description: Ki-100-II (prototypes): powered with a 1,120 kW (1,500 hp) Mitsubishi Ha-112-II Ru fitted with a turbocharger. 3 built.

variants.name: Army Fighter Type 5 Mark Ia
variants.description: Army Fighter Type 5 Mark Ia: IJA designation for Ki-100-I-Ko

variants.name: Army Fighter Type 5 Mark Ib
variants.description: Army Fighter Type 5 Mark Ib: IJA designation for Ki-100-I-Otsu
